name: mmdblookup
description: A promise based spawn version of the mmdblookup utility

scripts.update: db=dbip-country-lite-2019-09.mmdb; rm -rf ${db} ${db}.gz && curl -LO https://download.db-ip.com/free/${db}.gz && gunzip ${db}.gz && mv ${db} dbip-country-lite.mmdb
scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run clean && npm test

author: Andrea Giammarchi
